title: Do you know if there are any pictures of the St. Paul\'s Catholic church that was on Maco Rd. in the area of what used to be called Farmer\'s Turnout? It was supposedly on the land donated by Major James Reilly.
text: Hello. I'm not sure if there are any photos, but here's a link with some more information. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4516 I'm going to pass your question on to Scott Nunn, who writes the Back Then column about local history. Maybe someone can give us a clue.
